flavorText:
"What does a mountain fear of a fly? Giants are barely aware of us, let alone afraid."
—Gaddock Teeg

foreignData.flavorText: „Fürchtet sich ein Berg vor einer Mücke? Riesen nehmen uns doch kaum wahr und noch weniger ernst." —Gaddock Teeg
foreignData.name: Gefälligkeit der Mächtigen
foreignData.text: Alle Kreaturen mit den höchsten umgewandelten Manakosten haben Schutz vor allen Farben.

foreignData.flavorText: "¿Qué teme una montaña de una mosca? Los gigantes apenas notan nuestra existencia, mucho menos nos temen." —Gaddock Teeg
foreignData.name: Favor de los poderosos
foreignData.text: Cada criatura con el mayor coste de maná convertido tiene protección contra todos los colores.

foreignData.flavorText: « Pourquoi une montagne craindrait-elle une mouche ? Les géants remarquent à peine notre existence, pourquoi auraient-ils peur ? » —Gaddock Teeg
foreignData.name: Faveur des puissants
foreignData.text: Chaque créature ayant le coût converti de mana le plus élevé a la protection contre toutes les couleurs.

foreignData.flavorText: "Cos'ha da temere la montagna da una mosca? I giganti sono sì e no consapevoli della nostra esistenza, figurarsi se sono spaventati." —Gaddock Teeg
foreignData.name: Benevolenza dei Potenti
foreignData.text: Ogni creatura con il costo di mana convertito più alto ha protezione da tutti i colori.

foreignData.flavorText: 「山が蝿を怖がったことがあるか？ 巨人だって、我々を恐れるどころか、気にすることすらまずないぞ。」 ――ガドック・ティーグ
foreignData.name: 強き者の優位
foreignData.text: 点数で見たマナ・コストが最も大きい各クリーチャーは、それぞれプロテクション（すべての色）を持つ。
foreignData.type: 部族エンチャント — 巨人

foreignData.flavorText: "Que medo tem uma montanha de uma mosca? Os gigantes mal sabem que existimos, muito menos têm medo." — Gaddock Teeg
foreignData.name: Proteção do Poderoso
foreignData.text: Cada criatura com o maior custo de mana convertido tem proteção contra todas as cores.

foreignData.flavorText: "С чего бы это гора испугалась мухи? Гиганты нас практически не замечают, куда уж там боятся". — Гэддок Тиг
foreignData.name: Покровительство Сильных
foreignData.text: Каждое существо с наибольшей конвертированной мана-стоимостью имеет Защиту от всех цветов.

foreignData.flavorText: 「山为何要怕苍蝇？ 巨人根本没注意过我们，更别说惧怕了。」 ～加达提格
foreignData.name: 强者蒙恩
foreignData.text: 每个总法术力费用为最高的生物均获得反五色保护异能。

name: Favor of the Mighty
originalText: Each creature with the highest converted mana cost has protection from all colors.

rulings.text: If a creature has X in its mana cost, that X is treated as 0 for the purposes of this effect. It doesn’t matter what the value of X was while the creature was on the stack.
If there’s a tie for highest converted mana cost, all of those creatures have protection from all colors.
This effect is checked continuously. If a new creature enters the battlefield with the highest converted mana cost, it gains protection from all colors and the previous highest loses it.

text: Each creature with the highest mana value has protection from all colors.
